title: Vyacheslav Shevchenko
text:
Vyacheslav Shevchenko (; born 30 May 1985 in <a href="Ukrainian%20SSR">Ukrainian SSR</a>) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="football%20%28association%29">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29%23Striker">striker</a> who currently plays for <a href="FC%20Dinaz%20Vyshhorod">FC Dinaz Vyshhorod</a>.
He is nephew of former Ukraine striker <a href="Andriy%20Shevchenko">Andriy Shevchenko</a>.
Shevchenko is the product of the UFC Lviv School System. He made his debut in <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> for FC Illichivets Mariupol entering as a second-half substitute against <a href="FC%20Metalurh%20Donetsk">FC Metalurh Donetsk</a> on 25 May 2007.
